events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon at an intersection, resulting in front-end damage to their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to reported vehicle collision and damages sustained.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to assist the customer with their auto accident insurance claim.
The insurer acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured the customer that the process will begin shortly.
The customer was requested to submit a police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including the police report and multiple photos showing the extent of the vehicle damage.
The investigation team has begun reviewing provided evidence and contacting involved parties to verify the details of the vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded confirming coverage applicability and the extent of vehicle damages caused by the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair estimates and investigation findings for the vehicle damage claim.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claims process so far.
The claim was officially approved following the agreement on the proposed settlement amount for the vehicle repairs.
The first installment payment was issued to the customer’s bank account to cover the auto repair costs.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after full payment and confirmation of repair completion.
The case files and communication records were archived as the claim has been finalized and closed with the client’s satisfaction.
